description.line2: Solving complex problems with clean, elegant code

presentation.section1: Hello! I'm Luiz, a passionate full-stack developer who believes in the power of rubber duck debugging. Just like explaining your code to a rubber duck helps you find solutions, I approach every project with clarity, patience, and attention to detail.
presentation.section2: With expertise in modern web technologies, I create scalable applications that solve real-world problems. My development philosophy centers around clean code, user experience, and continuous learning.

webbicho.description: Webbicho is a platform that connects animal welfare NGOs with people looking to adopt, support, or get involved. Simple, intuitive, and built for non-tech users.

description.line1: Got a project that needs help of a rubber ducky?
description.line2: Let's collaborate and create something amazing!

appFooter.builtWith: Built with Next.js and a rubber duck.
